name: CVE-2021-40438
description: A crafted request uri-path can cause mod_proxy to forward the request to an origin server choosen by the remote user. This issue affects Apache HTTP Server 2.4.48 and earlier.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:apache:http_server:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:fedoraproject:fedora:34:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:fedoraproject:fedora:35:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:debian:debian_linux:9.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:debian:debian_linux:10.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:debian:debian_linux:11.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:netapp:cloud_backup:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:netapp:storagegrid:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:netapp:clustered_data_ontap:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:f5:f5os:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:f5:f5os:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:http_server:12.2.1.3.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:instantis_enterprisetrack:17.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:instantis_enterprisetrack:17.2:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:instantis_enterprisetrack:17.3:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:http_server:12.2.1.4.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:enterprise_manager_ops_center:12.4.0.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:zfs_storage_appliance_kit:8.8:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:secure_global_desktop:5.6:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:siemens:sinema_server:14.0:-:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:siemens:sinec_nms:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')]
